title: J S MILL & SOCIALISM with Helen McCabe
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary:
A deep dive into J S Mill's relationship with socialism with Helen McCabe. We cover Mill's moral foundations, pre-Marxian Socialism, the nature and history of liberalism and socialism, their interpretation today, and if Mill's vision is a realizable one.

Website:

https://www.politicalphilosophypodcast.com/

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PoliticalPhilosophyPodcast
